member.name: M:TryIT.ObjectExtension.StringExtension.ReplaceString(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.StringComparison,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a new string in which all occurrences of a specified string in the current instance are replaced with another specified string according the type of search to use for the specified string.
member.param: The string performing the replace method.
The string replace all occurrences of . If value is equal to null, than all occurrences of will be removed from the .
One of the enumeration values that specifies the rules for the search, defualt StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase
true to match whold word during the comparison; otherwise, false. default false, e.g. if value is true, then find 'A' from 'ABC' will not able found, find 'A' from 'A BC' will able found
member.returns: A string that is equivalent to the current string except that all instances of are replaced with . If is not found in the current instance, the method returns the current instance unchanged.

member.name: M:TryIT.ObjectExtension.StringExtension.IndexOf(System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.StringComparison,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Reports the zero-based index of the first occurrence of the specified string in the current System.String object
member.param: One of the enumeration values that specifies the rules for the search.
true to match whold world during the comparison; otherwise, false.
member.returns: The zero-based index position of the value parameter if that string is found, or -1 if it is not. If value is System.String.Empty, the return value is startIndex.
